value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I...I don't know what to do! I never
imagined something like this could
happen within the castle's walls!$k$p$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|Whoa! What's with the face, Alfonse?
You too, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|Looks like you're hard at work
thinking! Trying to come up with
a new game to play?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Unfortunately, no. Are you familiar
with the Orbs we use to summon
Heroes? Well, they're missing.$k$p$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|So the Orbs just disappeared out
of $Nu's room?$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... Hey! Orbs are those round
sparkly thingies, aren't they?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right. And without them, we can't
summon Heroes here from worlds
beyond this one...$k$pThat means the Order of Heroes
can't gain new recruits, which will
reduce our effectiveness in battle.$k$p$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|I see. If something that important just
disappeared, I understand why you'd
be worried!$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|Wait—I know where they are!$k$p$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|Well, Selkie? Don't just stand there
wagging your tail! Spit it out already!$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|Well, you see... Not long ago, I was
running around the castle, and I ran
past $Nu's room...$k$pI didn't think anything of it at the
time, but I did see Keaton and
Velouria lurking around...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Really?! Lurking? Were they
planning something?$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|Well, I saw them separately, so...
maybe? I was doing laps around the
castle, so I passed a few times...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Could...they have taken the Orbs?$k$p$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|If you really want to know, it'd
probably be easiest to just ask them!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm... You're right. In any case, I want
more information. It's possible they
saw something!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Huh? Why would I ever need to go
in $Nu's room?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Er, well... You were seen near the
room, so I wanted to ask if you saw
anything...unusual.$k$p$WmMPID_フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_Normal,Face|Nope! Nothing unusual! Anyway, I'm
about to go hunting... Do you mind?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh... Right! Go ahead. Sorry for
keeping you.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Hm. If Keaton says he didn't go near
$Nu's room...$k$pVelouria might still know something.
We'll see what she has to say!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|There's nothing interesting over
there, so I have no reason to go
by $Nu's room...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Er, well... You were seen over by
the room, so I wanted to ask if you
maybe saw anything...unusual?$k$p$WmMPID_ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_Normal,Face|Whoever thinks they saw me was
mistaken. Now, if you don't need
anything else, I'll be going...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Huh. So Velouria claims to not know
anything about the Orb theft either...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|I see... So neither Keaton nor Velouria
admitted to being where Selkie says
she saw them?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right. And nothing either of them
said struck me as suspicious.$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|I swear I saw them! But I also doubt
either could be the Orb thief we're
looking for.$k$p$WmMPID_ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_Normal,Face|Yeah, they're both a little odd, but...
they're not bad people. Which means
there's still a mystery to solve!$k$pIt's up to me—Kaden, the greatest
and most beautiful detective—to
catch this Orb thief of ours!$k$p$WmMPID_キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_Normal,Face|I wanna play too! I'll be your trusty
assistant, Selkie! We'll get those Orbs
back in no time!$k$p
